name: sassy-beaches
description: A css library written in sass; will be similar to bootstrap but rather different; I may also perform petty theft on bootstrap; I don't know. How will it differ from bootstrap? Bootstrap is a css library that you can customize, this will be intended to be a css library builder, in essence.
